description:
薇薇安将自己的血液转化为治愈力量治愈队友，
目标HP比例越低治疗量越大
name: 鲜血治愈I
note:
<Hide if Learned Skill: 63,64>
<Custom HP Cost>
cost += user.mhp/50+user.hp/25;
</Custom HP Cost>

<技能类型:技能>

<Damage Formula>
if(user == target){
  value = user.mhp/50 + user.hp/25;
  value = Math.floor(value);
}
else{
  value = user.mhp/20;
  value += user.mat*(1 + user.mat*user.level/2048);
  value *= (1 + user.hp/user.mhp - target.hp/target.mhp);
  value = Math.floor(value);
}
</Damage Formula>

  value *= (1 + user.hp/user.mhp - target.hp/target.mhp);
  value = Math.floor(value);
}
</Damage Formula>

description:

<技能类型:技能>

<Pre-Damage Eval>
   target.addState(258);
</Pre-Damage Eval>

<Target: Everybody>

 <MP Cost: 2%>

<Damage Formula>
if (target.isActor() === user.isActor()) {
 value = user.mat * (3/2 + (user.isLearnedSkill(199)? 1/2 : 0) + (user.isLearnedSkill(200)? 1/2 : 0));
 value *= (3/2+user.mat*user.level/2048); 
 if(user.isStateAffected(372)){
    value *= 2;
 }
} else {
 value = user.mat * (3/2 + (user.isLearnedSkill(199)? 1/2 : 0) + (user.isLearnedSkill(200)? 1/2 : 0));
 value -= target.mdf;
 value *= (3/2+user.mat*user.level/2048); 
 if(user.isStateAffected(372)){
    value *= 3/2;
 }
}
</Damage Formula>

<Pre-Damage Eval>
if (target.isActor() === user.isActor()) {
 value = -1 * Math.abs(value);
 target.removeState(62);
 target.removeState(93);
 target.removeState(90);
}
else{
    var random = Math.random();
    if(user.isLearnedSkill(200)){
        if(random > 0.3){
        target.addState(93);
        }
    }
    else{
      if(user.isLearnedSkill(199)){
        if(random > 0.5){
         target.addState(93);
         }
     }
     else{
        if(random > 0.7){
         target.addState(93);
         }
     }
    }
}
</Pre-Damage Eval>

<技能类型:空手普攻>

<Before Eval>
user._agatktimes = user._agatktimes || 0;
if(user.isStateAffected(292) && user._agatktimes > 0){
   user._agatktimes -= 1;
   if(user._agatktimes <= 0){
    user.removeState(292);
   }
  }
</Before  Eval>

<damage formula>
  value = 50;
  if(user.isStateAffected(292) && user._agatktimes > 0){
   value += (user.atk * 2 +user.mat - target.def*0.85);
  }
  else{
   value += (user.atk * 2 +user.mat - target.def);
  }
  value *= (user.level*user.atk/2048+2);
  value *= 0.5+user.level/198;
  if(user.isStateAffected(298)){
    if(user.isLearnedSkill(222)){
      value += 5000;
     }
   else{
      if(user.isLearnedSkill(221)){
        value += 3000;
        }
     else{
       if(user.isLearnedSkill(220)){
          value += 1200;
         }
       else{
         if(user.isLearnedSkill(219)){
           value += 400;
             }
          else{
           value += 75;
           }
         }
       }
     }
   }
 value = Math.floor(value);
</damage formula>


<Post-Damage Eval>
 if(user.isStateAffected(292)){
    var random = Math.round(Math.random() * 10 + 1);
    if(random <= 3){
     user.addState(281);
    }
 }
</Post-Damage  Eval>

description:
仅在\c[17]化身圣焰\c[0]时可使用，使用圣焰同化自身2/3的护盾并转化为攻击性能量发射
出去，对目标及相邻目标造成高额圣属性伤害，但使用也会解除\c[17]化身圣焰\c[0]
name: 圣焰元气弹
note:
<技能类型:技能>

<Custom Requirement>
  if(user.isStateAffected(18)){
      value = ture;
  }
   else{
      value = false;
   }
</Custom Requirement>

<Custom Target Eval>
targets.push(target);
targets.push($gameTroop.members()[this._targetIndex - 1]);
targets.push($gameTroop.members()[this._targetIndex + 1]);
</Custom Target Eval>

<damage formula> 
  value = user.mat*6 - target.mdf;
  value *= (2 + user.mat*user.level/2048);
  value += 200 + 1200*user.level/99;
  var barrier = user.barrierPoints();
  value += barrier*2/3;
  value = Math.floor(value);
</damage formula>

<After Eval>
var barrier = user.barrierPoints();
barrier = Math.floor(barrier*2/3);
user.loseBarrier(-barrier);
user.removeState(18);
</After Eval>

   speed = speed * (Math.min(0.3, 0.6 - user.mat/target.mat));
  }
</Target ATB Eval>
